example.text: Every rocket launched from Gaza was paid for by Iran. The Iranian regime continues to fund terror and human rights abuses across the Middle East. We must hold the regime accountable.

I introduced legislation this year, HR 8823, the Safe Zones Ac t, to change the asylum process by creating safe zones at the Mexico-Guatemala border to provide a safe place for migrants to apply for asylum. This bill would end the dangerous and deadly trek to our southern border and cut criminal profits out of the equation.
